name: Archmage-Beta
description:
After the last Archmage's disappearance into an odd catacomb on the edge of the earth, many accomplished wizards and sorcerers followed to save him. None have returned, and even worse are the stories about what horrors they've become. Now it is your turn to brave the depths in search of answers, power, or glory. But beware! Only one fit to be the Archmage will survive...

Features This game is still in Beta. As such, it may be updated abruptly
  • 38 unique cards, providing limitless deck building possibilities
  • 12 enemy types
  • 2 bosses
  • Procedurally generated dungeons
  • Intense, skill-based combat
Project Status
  1. Create General Game Framework
  2. Release Beta Playtest
  3. Launch Kickstarter
  4. Finalize gameplay elements
  5. Finish polish and sprites
  6. Deploy
Attribution

The AI Dream by Wombo generated all loading screen and menu background art.

The tileset comes from Pixel_Poem and Raou.

Spell images and characters are by Aleksandr_Makarov.

Additional art by Jacquecruz.

Controls Reference

WASD - Move

Q/E or Click hotbar - Cycle hotbar

R - Discard leftmost card in hand

Click - Cast selected spell

ESC - Pause

Install Information

These are the typical install locations for the runnable Application after running the installer:

On Windows saves to Apps and to C:\Program Files\Archmage

On Mac saves to Macintosh HD\Applications

A text file will also be created under C:\Users\<Your Profile>\ which saves game data. Moving, deleting, or editing this file will compromise your save file.
